lead_paragraph: LeBron James and Kyrie Irving scored 23 points each and the Cleveland Cavaliers beat the Charlotte Hornets 114-103 on Wednesday night.

headline.print_headline: James, Irving Lead Cavaliers Past Hornets, 114-103
headline.main: James, Irving Lead Cavaliers Past Hornets, 114-103

snippet: LeBron James and Kyrie Irving scored 23 points each and the Cleveland Cavaliers beat the Charlotte Hornets 114-103 on Wednesday night....
